biotools.summary: Taking as input one or several sets of position-specific scoring matrices, this program applies hierarchical clustering to identify clusters of similar motifs. It produces a set of trees (one per cluster) and builds branch motifs at each node of each tree by merging the matrices of all descendent nodes.

bioschemas.name: matrix-clustering
bioschemas.summary: Taking as input one or several sets of position-specific scoring matrices, this program applies hierarchical clustering to identify clusters of similar motifs. It produces a set of trees (one per cluster) and builds branch motifs at each node of each tree by merging the matrices of all descendent nodes.
